info.name: Video converter
info.summary: Extract archive from the web interface
info.description:
Extract zip and rar files.
* **Features :** Zip and rar extraction.
* **Requirements :** Rar PHP extension or unrar (pecl -v install rar)
* **Note :** If you want to use this app on external local storage add the mount points on your config.php file like this (no / at the end)
`'external' => array ( 0 => '/home/localfoler', 1 => '/share/anotherfolder', ),`
info.author: Paul Lereverend
